name: By All Means Necessary Action Figure
description:
Digital custom action figure representation of BDP Crew’s sophomore album. “By All Means Necessary” was released in May, 1988. A year after the group’s breakthrough debut “Criminal Minded”, and was recorded after the death of DJ Scott La Rock. It’s the album that marked emcee KRS-One moving away from violent themes and into socially conscious lyrics with a new moniker as ’The Teacher’.  The album’s legendary cover art is a reference to the iconic photo of Malcolm X peeing through his window while holding a rifle. While the album’s title itself is a modification of Malcolm X’s famous phrase “by any means necessary”.

Card is made from the cover shot of By All Means Necessary.

Figure is made from Super 7's Red Dawn, El-P, Marty McFly & Run DMC Reaction figure, Celebrity Dollhouse’s Jackie Robinson figure, and a Hot Toys Micro Uzi.
